title: Pixel 3a back side protectors. Will it damage the polycarbonate material on the back. ?
content: Its just a trivial matter but since i got the pixel 3a along with a front and a back glass protectors. Is it okay to put a back glass protector on the backside of the phone ? I mean if it was glass it would be actually effective but considering the more grippy and polycarbonate material on the back side of the phone, will it cause any problem ?
